src:
Menikmati Gurih Kenyal Sate Gurita di Tepi Pantai Jolosutro
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Erliana Riady - detikFood


Foto: Erliana Riady/detikcom

Blitar - Blitar punya beragam kuliner. Salah satunya olahan gurita yang tidak semua pedagang seafood menyediakannya. Sate gurita, teksturnya yang gurih kenyal bikin nagih.Menu ini bisa didapatkan di Pantai Jolosutro Desa Ringinrejo Kecamatan Wates, Kabupaten Blitar. Banyaknya gurita tangkapan nelayan setempat, membuat warga sekitar berinovasi mengolahnya menjadi sate.Tempat yang menyediakan sate gurita itu ada di warung milik Suhani. Lokasinya di sisi timur bibir Pantai Jolosutro. Di bawah rindangnya pohon cemara, dari jauh aroma gurita yang dipanggang, wangi semerbak menggoda selera.


Foto: Erliana Riady/detikcom

Seperti diketahui daging gurita lebih liat dan tebal dibandingkan dengan cumi-cumi sehingga mengolahnya juga perlu trik khusus."Cara mengolahnya, gurita kami rebus dengan bumbu rahasia sampai dagingnya empuk. Baru dipotong kecil-kecil lalu ditusuki seperti umumnya sate," terang pria berusia 32 tahun itu pada detikcom, Kamis (31/10/2019).Suhani tak perlu waktu lama untuk memanggang sate gurita ini. Hanya sekitar 10 menit dibalik-balik di atas bara api satepun siap disajikan. Aroma gurihnya semerbak memenuhi bibir pantai berpasir putih ini.


Foto: Erliana Riady/detikcom

Usai dipanggang diberi saus kacang tanah dan tidak lupa ditaburi irisan bawang merah mentah diatasnya. Disajikan bersama sambal kecap beserta wadahnya menyesuaikan selera pedas konsumennya.Tampak calon penikmat kuliner tak sabar menunggu sate gurita disajikan. Apalagi jika akhir pekan, Suhani bisa mengolah sebanyak 10 kg gurita. Mereka rela antre didepan alat panggang, agar segera bisa menyantap gurih kenyalnya sate gurita.


Foto: Erliana Riady/detikcom

"Rasanya istimewa. Gak semua tempat jual seafood ada sate guritanya. Kenyal, gurih lebih sehat juga. Dan sensasi makan di pinggir laut ini yang tambah luar biasa," kata Kapolres Blitar, AKBP Budi Hermanto yang baru bertugas di Blitar.


Foto: Erliana Riady/detikcom

Gurita mengandung zat besi yang tinggi dan baik untuk kesehatan. Hewan bertentakel ini merupakan sumber kalsium, kalium, fosfor, dan selenium. Selain itu ada juga beberapa vitamin penting yang terkandung di dalamnya, termasuk vitamin C, A, beberapa vitamin B, serta beberapa asam lemak omega-3.Harganya juga sangat ramah di kantong, dibandingkan seafood lainnya. Hanya Rp 25 ribu per porsi. Nikmati sedapnya sate gurita plus deburan ombak Pantai Jolosutro membuat santapan makin mantap.Simak Video "Sedap Gurih Sate Gurita Blitar yang Menggoda"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)
text:
Enjoying Gurih Kenyal Sate Octopus on the banks of Jolosutro Beach
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Erliana Riady - detikFood


Photo: Erliana Riady / detikcom

Blitar - Blitar has a variety of culinary delights. One of them is processed octopus which not all seafood traders provide. Octopus satay, the chewy texture makes it delicious. This menu can be found at Jolosutro Beach, Ringinrejo Village, Wates District, Blitar Regency. The large number of octopus caught by local fishermen, makes local residents innovate to process it into satay. The place that provides octopus satay is in Suhani's shop. Its location on the east side of the lip Jolosutro Beach. Under the shade of an evergreen tree, from afar the aroma of roasted octopus, the fragrant aroma tempts the taste buds.


Photo: Erliana Riady / detikcom

As is known octopus meat is thicker and thicker than the squid so processing it also requires special tricks. "How to process it, our octopus boiled with a secret seasoning until the meat is tender. Just cut into small pieces and then stabbed like most satay," explained 32-year-old man that year on detikcom, Thursday (10/31/2019). Lord did not take long to bake this octopus satay. Only about 10 minutes flipped over on a single embers ready to be served. The fragrant savory aroma fills the edge of this white sandy beach.


Photo: Erliana Riady / detikcom

After baking, it is given peanut sauce and don't forget to sprinkle it with raw onion slices. Served with soy sauce and the container to adjust the spicy tastes of consumers. Looks prospective culinary connoisseurs can not wait for octopus satay served. Especially if on weekends, Suhani can process as much as 10 kg of octopus. They are willing to stand in line in front of the roast utensils, so that they can quickly eat savory chewy octopus satay.


Photo: Erliana Riady / detikcom

"It feels special. Not all seafood shops have octopus satay. Chewy, savory, healthier too. And the sensation of eating on the seafront is even more extraordinary," said Blitar Police Chief, AKBP Budi Hermanto, who recently served in Blitar.


Photo: Erliana Riady / detikcom

Octopus contains high iron and is good for health. These bertentakel animals are a source of calcium, potassium, phosphorus, and selenium. In addition there are also some important vitamins contained in them, including vitamins C, A, some B vitamins, as well as some omega-3 fatty acids. The prices are also very friendly in the bag, compared to other seafood. Only IDR 25 thousand per portion. Enjoy the savory taste of octopus satay plus the waves of Jolosutro Beach to make food even more solid. Watch the video "Tasty Savory Blitar Octopus Sate is Tempting" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (adr / odi)
